entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
